verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] known to be an avid cable news consumer , despite his claims that he has " very little time for watching TV . "
President Donald Trump is [V: known] [ARG1: to be an avid cable news consumer] , [ARGM-ADV: despite his claims that he has " very little time for watching TV] . "
[ARG1: President Donald Trump] is known to [V: be] [ARG2: an avid cable news consumer] , despite his claims that he has " very little time for watching TV . "
President Donald Trump is known to be an avid cable news consumer , despite his claims that [ARG0: he] [V: has] " [ARG1: very little time for watching TV] . "
President Donald Trump is known to be an avid cable news consumer , despite his claims that [ARG0: he] has " very little time for [V: watching] [ARG1: TV] . "
